name: Flappy Blank
description:
This was supposed to be a classical "Flappy Bird" in pixel art... but in the development process something went wrong and now the pixels are so big that they engulfed the screen! You can see only two colours, one at a time, but fortunately there's a pattern: when you see green you are in front of a tube, and when you see blue you can fly through the "gap" between the obstacles!
Read the INSTRUCTION BOOKLET for more information about this tile-based version of the game created by Dong Nguyen! Hope you enjoy it! :)

---------------------------------------

CONTROL SCHEME

ESC: quit
UP/W: go right (1 tile) and up (1 tile)
DOWN/S (or waiting 2 seconds): go right (1 tile) and down (1 tile)
IN "DEATH" SCREEN
R: restart
P: print your score (or save it if you don't have a printer!)

--------------------------------------

SEIZURE WARNING: when you die the screen flashes!

BUG REPORT: the "print" function can sometimes cause problems on certain computers! You could have to restart the game when this little bug occurs!

Made for bitjam!
